allBlogs.title: A failed app idea and some new learnings
allBlogs.description: If we could generate transcript files offline, how can we integrate it with audio files. I was thinking about something similar to external subtitle files used in video players. Came to know that it is possible with the help of TextTracks and WebVTT format. I did a small POC and it went well.

allBlogs.title: What did I learn this week (2021) - 48
allBlogs.description: Weekly summarization and review of things I've learned in the final week of November 2021
